t7.expressions

Interface Expression

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArithmeticExpression, BooleanExpression, TripletExpression, VariableExpression

    public interface Expression
    An abstract expression.
    Author:
    kinan

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Expression.Types
      The possible types for expressions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VariableType evaluate(StatementHandler handler, java.lang.String name, int value)
      Evaluates the given Expression using the state represented in the given handler.
      Expression.Types getType()
      Get the type of the expression.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        Expression.Types getType()
        Get the type of the expression.
        Returns:
        the type.

      • evaluate

        VariableType evaluate(StatementHandler handler,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      int value)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                      java.lang.ArithmeticException
        Evaluates the given Expression using the state represented in the given handler.
        Parameters:
        handler - contains the state of the program.
        name - the name of the variable to override its value in this expression scope.
        value - the new value of the variable inside this expression scope.
        Returns:
        the value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if a variable type mismatched.
        java.lang.ArithmeticException - if division by zero.
